Html:
Hi All,

I have a window based on the RibbonWindow.  When I set the background to another color, a small blue line remains on the right hand side of the window, and I cannot seem to get rid of it.  Does anyone have the same problem, or has someone managed to sort out the problem maybe?

Any help is appreciated.

Thanks,
John
Not sure I get it, but can you post a screenshot?

Hi chakkaradeep,

I found the problem thank you, there was a problem with the alignment of one of my grid layouts on the page.

Thanks,
John
